name: USlider
doc:
A simple widget that shows a sliding bar with a handle that allows you to control the value in a user define range (between 0..1 by default).

* No Children

MouseUsesStep: Sets new value if mouse position is greater/less than half the step size.
RequiresControllerLock: Sets whether we have to lock input to change the slider value.
OnMouseCaptureBegin: Invoked when the mouse is pressed and a capture begins.
OnMouseCaptureEnd: Invoked when the mouse is released and a capture ends.
OnControllerCaptureBegin: Invoked when the controller capture begins.
OnControllerCaptureEnd: Invoked when the controller capture ends.
OnValueChanged: Called when the value is changed by slider or typing.
MinValue: The minimum value the slider can be set to.
MaxValue: The maximum value the slider can be set to.
SliderBarColor: The color to draw the slider bar in.
SliderHandleColor: The color to draw the slider handle in.
IndentHandle: Whether the slidable area should be indented to fit the handle.
Locked: Whether the handle is interactive or fixed.
StepSize: The amount to adjust the value by, when using a controller or keyboard

methods.name: GetNormalizedValue
methods.doc: Get the current value scaled from 0 to 1

methods.name: GetValue
methods.doc: Gets the current value of the slider.

methods.name: SetIndentHandle
methods.doc: Sets if the slidable area should be indented to fit the handle.

methods.name: SetLocked
methods.doc: Sets the handle to be interactive or fixed.

methods.name: SetMaxValue
methods.doc: Sets the maximum value of the slider.

methods.name: SetMinValue
methods.doc: Sets the minimum value of the slider.

methods.name: SetSliderBarColor
methods.doc: Sets the color of the slider bar.

methods.name: SetSliderHandleColor
methods.doc: Sets the color of the handle bar

methods.name: SetStepSize
methods.doc: Sets the amount to adjust the value by, when using a controller or keyboard.

methods.name: SetValue
methods.doc: Sets the current value of the slider.
